jobDescription: Scope/Role/DescriptionThe Bioinformatics Scientist will be responsible for organizing and maintaining existing software code base developed in house in addition to playing a role in new product development. The candidate will also be responsible for providing customer support and troubleshooting with internal and external customers. The ideal candidate must have strong Perl and R skillset in addition to other scripting and OOP languages like Python and Java. The ideal candidate should also have a strong JavaScript and web development background.Required skills and experience
